Articles.Content:
Ever since .90 I've been running into a problem with the VAB where I simply won't be able to grab a part on vessels once I've placed it. I scroll over it (in "Place" mode), it highlights green, but when I left click, nothing happens. This is extremely frustrating, and has no apparent rhyme or reason to it. Often times multiple parts on the vessel will simultaneously experience this issue, while others are perfectly normal.

Any ideas as to what's going on, and how to fix it? I'm running vanilla KSP .90 32-bit.

EDIT: Will repost in a support forum.

Edited December 24, 2014 by Jodo42

This sounds like a bug and probably should be in one of the support forums, but do you have any mods installed, and what operating system do you use?

Also see this thread for the full bug reporting guidelines

Edited December 24, 2014 by armagheddonsgw
